titles.title: Second Division Memorial Modification Act
A bill to authorize the modification of the Second Division Memorial, and for other purposes.
Second Division Memorial Modification Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Second Division Memorial Modification Act
This bill allows the Second Indianhead Division Association, Inc., Scholarship and Memorials Foundation to place additional commemorative elements or engravings on the raised platform or stone work of the Second Division Memorial located in President's Park in the District of Columbia to honor further the members of the Second Infantry Division who have given their lives in service to the United States.
No federal funds may be used for such modifications.
